name: Girofender (Vinicius César)
description:
Girofender

This game is under developpment but you can play it rigth now! 

Wellcome to Girofender!

Protect you base against the enemys using only one key!

- Use SPACE  to Shot and Turn  (Windows)
- Use on screen Button (Android)

Be carefull you energy need to be rechaged over the time!

Can you help ?

If you could support my work by making a donation.
I would greatly appreciate it. I know that money can be tight, so please know that even $5 helps me a lot ! Let me know if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to answer them. Thank you!
